p: The test substance was tested in triplicate at concentrations of 3.125, 6.25, 12.5, 25, 50 and 100 µg/ml. Growth medium from each well of a 96-well plate containing healthy culture was replaced with 200 µl of the test substance and controls respectively. The cultures were then incubated for 24 hours at 37 °C in a humidified atmosphere of 5% carbon dioxide and 95% air.
